author: Dakin Andone, CNN
title: False hope: Experts warn it's important to manage expectations
description: For many, hearing officials discuss reopening the country comes as a relief. It means there's a light at the end of the tunnel, that after weeks of staying home, the world will eventually return to normal -- even if "normal" looks a little different than it u…
